title: Discrimination
fullText:
An RCD that is used as an LPD shall not be protected by another RCD unless it is of a higher rating and discrimination is ensured. A 30 mA RCD shall not be used in the switchboard in lieu of mechanical protection for final sub-circuits supplying body-protected or cardiac-protected electrical areas.
Exception:
1	Installations that conform with NZS 6115.
NOTES:
1	A 30 mA RCD upstream of a 10 mA RCD will not provide adequate discrimination.
2	See Clause 5.2 for home care installations.
